name: Vootouch
author: Lujayninfoways

sections.description:
Vootouch is a convenient WooCommerce plugin and the best solution for entrepreneur to merge their e-commerce business on mobile platforms. It Covers all the default functinality of Woocommerce.

Vootouch is WooCommerce Plugin Which will make connect between the Vootouch Mobile Application and WooCommerce website.
Its 100% FREE to use, Download iPhone & Android Native SDK, Download Plugin and Get Started. To check the demo Vootouch application you need to install Vootouch plugin on your WooCommerce site first.

Requires WooCommerce 2.6+

=Features=

Category hierarchies
Quick Product Access with Detail page and Varios varietns..
Easy Checkout

Order lists and Details

More Details

  • How it Works [Click here] (http://vootouch.com/#demo) Here are steps how you can set up.
  • View more of Features Click Here

Localization

*English (default).

Plugin Requirement

PHP version : 5.3 and latest
WordPress : WordPress 3.0 and latest
WooCommerce : 2.6+
sections.installation:
1. Install Plugin and Activate your Plugin
  2. Upload the vootouch folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Click on Setting Tab, you will able to do Change the logo, Font color , Background color of the application .
    4) Whatever Content you set on contact and Terms and conditions , It will be display on Mobile under the menu, if you do not want to display Leave blank.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install Plugin and Activate your Plugin
  2. Upload the vootouch folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Click on Setting Tab, you will able to do Change the logo, Font color , Background color of the application .
    4) Whatever Content you set on contact and Terms and conditions , It will be display on Mobile under the menu, if you do not want to display Leave blank.

After install the plugin What is next ?

After that you can check demo how the app will be look on mobile so install the plugin, Enable it, then Go to App store, Find vootouch , Install vootouch Application on your mobile phone (iphone or Android). After sucessfully installed It will ask url of your woocommerce site, Enter the url and Click on Trial button so you see your front end store on your mobile. The demo is completely free and every can set up .

For more How to Setup Demo kindly check http://vootouch.com/#demo (HOW TO SETUP THE DEMO)
